definitions.definition: meet and come into violent conflict.
examples: protesters demanding self-rule clashed with police
synonyms: come into conflict; do battle "protesters clashed with police"

examples: Clarke has frequently clashed with his colleagues
synonyms: be at loggerheads "the mayor clashed with union leaders"

examples: his thriftiness clashed with Ross's largesse

definitions.definition: (of colors) appear discordant or ugly when placed close to each other.
synonyms: be discordant "her red scarf clashed with her coat"

definitions.definition: inconveniently occur at the same time.
examples: the date of the wedding clashes with Sean's graduation

definitions.definition: strike (cymbals) together, producing a loud discordant sound.
examples: bang, strike, clang, crash she clashed the cymbals together
